text: Troy Smith (born July 20, 1984 in Cleveland, Ohio) is an American former professional football quarterback. He played for 3 seasons in the National Football League (NFL). He played for the Baltimore Ravens, San Francisco 49ers, and Pittsburgh Steelers. He also played for the Montreal Alouettes of the Canadian Football League (CFL) and the Omaha Nighthawks of the United Football League (UFL). Smith was drafted out of the Ohio State University by the Baltimore Ravens with the 174th pick in the fifth round of the 2007 NFL Draft. On October 16, 2014, the Alouettes released Smith. He retired afterwards. ==References== ==Other websites== *Troy Smith at NFL.com Category:1987 births Category:Living people Category:Baltimore Ravens players Category:Montreal Alouettes players Category:Pittsburgh Steelers players Category:San Francisco 49ers players Category:African-American players of American football Category:American football quarterbacks Category:Sportspeople from Cleveland Category:Heisman Trophy winners
title: Troy Smith
